pageContext.claim: “Barack Hussein Obama yesterday, they made the mistake -- [Audience boos] -- the cameras slipped and they showed his crowd, he had about 20 people there. Barack Hussein. Which was about 10 people more than Sleepy Joe had yesterday.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden campaign rallies are purposely smaller because he and his surrogates are following federal guidelines designed to prevent the spread of the coronavirus; Trump consistently ignores the guidelines and puts his supporters at risk. Trump also wildly overestimates the size of his crowds.
